basic.floral_language:
Armeniaca mume var. alphandii
Floriography: pride, strong and charming
Armeniaca mume var. alphandii blossom proudly in the snow, with orchid, bamboo, and chrysanthemum together referred to as the "four gentlemen" in the flower, has been named as the city flower of Wuhan. 
Armeniaca mume var. alphandii plant strong firm and pretty. Leaf blade elliptic, flowers are delicate and cabinet. Color is various, petals of 5 single and double. The fragrance of plum blossom is from bitter cold, a symbol of the Chinese nation strong spiritual quality. 
Armeniaca mume var. alphandii blossom like the sunshine, summer noon light should be covered. Because of the north-south differences, flowering in December to April of next year, with the ornamental period 1 to 2 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period February-March, viewing period 1-2 weeks
basic.color: Flower color light pink to red

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.watering: Moderately resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, top-dressing before and after flowering and defoliation
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
